wonders.name: Great Wall of China
wonders.description: An ancient series of walls and fortifications located in northern China.
wonders.additionalDetail: One of the most famous architectural achievements in history.

wonders.name: Petra
wonders.description: A historical and archaeological city famous for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system.
wonders.additionalDetail: Also known as the 'Rose City' for its distinctive color.

wonders.name: Christ the Redeemer
wonders.description: An iconic statue of Jesus Christ with open arms, symbolizing peace.
wonders.additionalDetail: It stands 30 meters tall atop the Corcovado mountain.

wonders.name: Machu Picchu
wonders.description: An Incan citadel set high in the Andes Mountains in Peru.
wonders.additionalDetail: Believed to be a royal estate or sacred religious site.

wonders.name: Chichen Itza
wonders.description: A large pre-Columbian archaeological site built by the Maya civilization.
wonders.additionalDetail: The site includes the Temple of Kukulcan, also known as El Castillo.

wonders.name: Roman Colosseum
wonders.description: An ancient amphitheater in Rome known for gladiatorial contests and public spectacles.
wonders.additionalDetail: It could hold an estimated 50,000 to 80,000 spectators.

wonders.name: Taj Mahal
wonders.description: A white marble mausoleum built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his wife Mumtaz Mahal.
wonders.additionalDetail: Considered one of the most beautiful buildings in the world.
